description: Dore ibiganiro tuzumva muri iki cyumweru kuri radio
title: Tuzumva Iki?
content: Iki cyumweru mu biganiro bya “Ni Nyampinga”, tuzaganira ku kwizigamira no gusubira mu ishuri uramutse wararivuyemo. Kuwa Gatatu muzumva Alphonsine watangiriye ku busa, uyu munsi akaba afite butiki ye abikesha kwizigamira. Kuwa Gatanu ho tuzaganira ku mbogamizi benshi bagira zo gusubira mu ishuri mu gihe bari bararivuyemo. Patience azatwereka uburyo we yabigenje ngo arisubiremo nubwo bitari bimworoheye. Mwibuke ko tuba dufite na Tyaza Ubwenge muri buri kiganiro. Naho kuwa Gatandatu, tuzagaruka ku biganiro byaranze icyumweru, ndetse na Shangazi asubize ibibazo mwamubajije
